content: > this pattern is available for free on my blog 1 the downloadable pdf listed for sale contains the full pattern including all photo tutorials + a bonus garment schematic + a bonus crochet cable stitch chart in one printable file without advertisements when it comes to cozy winter fashion nothing beats the warmth and timeless appeal of a cable crochet sweater the aelia cable crochet pullover for women has a slightly oversized fit tapered sleeves a split hem and last but not least a loosely draped cowl neck the size inclusive pullover sweater crochet pattern includes women s sizes xs through 5x purchase the kit here aff 2 lion brand also has a full kit of the chantilly crochet top available on their website the kit includes your choice of color and a digital copy of the pattern **size inclusive** women s sizes x-small small medium large x-large 2x-large 3x-large 4x-large 5x-large to fit chest 28-30 32-34 36-38 40-42 44-46 48-50 52-54 56-58 60 - 62 instructions included for adjusting sweater length **yarn** the sample in the photos was crocheted with lion brand yarns wool ease worsted weight / 4 yarn 80% acrylic / 20% wool 197 yards / 180 m / 85 g / 3 oz other worsted weight 4 yarns can be substituted as long as gauge is met **pattern notes** the pattern is a written pattern and also includes a garment schematic a crochet cable stitch chart and photo tutorials where needed crochet sweater design is an a crocheted simplicity original design join the a crocheted simplicity crochet community group on facebook to stay up to date with new releases giveaways sales and testing opportunities https //www facebook com/groups/906744872727855/ you can also find me on etsy a crocheted simplicity jennifer renaud all of my patterns are written in standard american terms unless noted otherwise please note that due to the nature of digital files i cannot take any refunds however i do offer customer support and will try my best to help you with the instructions © 2024 designed by jennifer renaud aka a crocheted simplicity all rights reserved this design the pattern and the images are property of a crocheted simplicity the buyer may use this pattern for personal use and charity sales of finished items are also permitted credit given to a crocheted simplicity is greatly appreciated no part of this document may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from jennifer renaud 1 https //www acrochetedsimplicity com/cable-crochet-sweater/ 2 https //shrsl com/4ox87
